title: RHOBH Detective PK + RHOSLC Taglines!
itunes:title: RHOBH Detective PK + RHOSLC Taglines!
itunes:subtitle: Danny starts the show by going over The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City taglines, then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. The RHOBH women finish their dinner at Kathy's with some loose legal threats, then meet for ...
description:
Danny starts the show by going over The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City taglines, then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. The RHOBH women finish their dinner at Kathy's with some loose legal threats, then meet for another meal at Garcelle's house. In between there's some auction drama and yet another awkward sit down between Rinna and Garcelle, plus Detective PK-atchu addresses the social media! Danny finishes by touching on that bonus episode of RHONY that they aired this week and a few thoughts on the Winter House reveal.


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
